analysis.reasoning: The highest similarity score (55) is below the duplicate threshold (70). While #8930 shares the same dialect (Moore), pass (MooreToCore), and assertion pattern (dyn_cast), the root cause is different: #8930 crashes during ConversionOp lowering with real type, while our bug crashes during getModulePortInfo() with string type port and sim::DynamicStringType. The specific crash location (sanitizeInOut in PortImplementation.h) and the involvement of hw::InOutType makes this a distinct issue.
unique_aspects: Crashes in getModulePortInfo() during port info construction
Fails at hw::InOutType dyn_cast in sanitizeInOut()
Triggered by string type output port declaration
No existing issue mentions sanitizeInOut or PortImplementation.h

recommendation_reason: No existing issue matches this specific crash pattern. The bug involves a unique code path (string type port → sim::DynamicStringType → sanitizeInOut() crash) that has not been reported before.
